SongName: When You Say Nothing At All
Album: Now That I've Found You - A Collection
Lyric:
[00:11.990]It's amazing how you can speak right to my heart
[00:22.700]Without saying a word you can light up the dark
[00:33.599]Try as I may I could never explain
[00:39.778]What I hear when you don't say a thing
[00:46.979]
[00:49.080]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[00:54.798]There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
[01:00.218]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me wherever i fall
[01:11.939]You say it best when you say nothing at all
[01:21.769]
[01:29.279]All day long I can hear people talking out loud
[01:40.559]But when you hold me near, you drown out the crowd
[01:51.590]Old Mr. Webster could never define
[01:57.139]What's being said between your heart and mine
[02:03.779]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[02:09.389]There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
[02:15.019]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me if ever I fall
[02:26.629]You say it best when you say nothing at all
[02:35.319]
[02:54.209]The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
[02:59.600]There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
[03:08.130]The touch of your hand says you'll catch me if ever I fall
[03:19.700]You say it best when you say nothing at all
[03:28.139]
